record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3159, ENSURING MILITARY READINESS THROUGH STABILITY AND PREDICTABILITY DEPLOYMENT POLICY ACT OF 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 601, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on ordering the previous question.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: DREIER
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.
